name: 9GAG, Inc
description: Operator of an online platform and social media website designed to share user-generated content. The company's online platform and social media website provides comical images that features user-generated videos under categories such as fail and prank, comedy, game, TV and music, providing users with an engagement platform for fun, conversation and connection.
one_liner: Operator of an online platform and social media website designed to share user-generated content. The company's online platform and social media website provides comical images that features user-generated videos under categories such as fail and prank, comedy, game, TV and music, providing users with an engagement platform for fun, conversation and connection.

name: Artiphon, Inc.
description: Developer of digital musical device designed to make musical expression ubiquitous and accessible to all. The company's device help to create songs with intuitive gestures like tapping, sliding, and waving, has a built-in speaker, and can switch between guitar, violin, piano, and drums at the press of a button, enabling users to have a digital instrument that adapts to the way they play.
one_liner: Developer of digital musical device designed to make musical expression ubiquitous and accessible to all. The company's device help to create songs with intuitive gestures like tapping, sliding, and waving, has a built-in speaker, and can switch between guitar, violin, piano, and drums at the press of a button, enabling users to have a digital instrument that adapts to the way they play.

name: BDG Media, Inc.
description: Developer of a digital media platform designed for young readers. The company's platform delivers everything readers want to read, including news, celebrity, culture, lifestyle, politics, fashion and beauty, enabling readers and social fans to get everything they need to know in one place and stay updated on all the things they love.
one_liner: Developer of a digital media platform designed for young readers. The company's platform delivers everything readers want to read, including news, celebrity, culture, lifestyle, politics, fashion and beauty, enabling readers and social fans to get everything they need to know in one place and stay updated on all the things they love.

name: Beatdapp Software Inc.
description: Operator of a SaaS-based platform intended to help music labels and artists track their songs to collect royalties. The company's tracking system authenticates, verifies, and validates media streamed in real-time and reduces the tracking discrepancies between Digital Service Providers (DSPs) and rights holders, enabling DSPs to increase their royalty revenue for rights holders while limiting legal exposure to royalty lawsuits.
one_liner: Operator of a SaaS-based platform intended to help music labels and artists track their songs to collect royalties. The company's tracking system authenticates, verifies, and validates media streamed in real-time and reduces the tracking discrepancies between Digital Service Providers (DSPs) and rights holders, enabling DSPs to increase their royalty revenue for rights holders while limiting legal exposure to royalty lawsuits.

name: 200 Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a no-code chatbot platform intended to automate communication with humans through messaging applications. The company's platform helps to build a bot without coding to automatically start conversations with prospects from post comments to increase lead generation and qualification, upsell, cross-sell, and boost revenue on WhatsApp, enabling e-commerce marketers and business owners to increase sales, reduce costs and automate support through chatbots.
one_liner: Developer of a no-code chatbot platform intended to automate communication with humans through messaging applications. The company's platform allows enterprises to have their exhibitions, job fairs and trade shows online, provides real time registration, event management services and event organizing services that helps event organizers with guest check-ins and walk-in on-site registration, providing a one-stop platform for event management and organization.

The company's platform assists brands in engaging with movie enthusiasts by automating content creation, audience engagement and marketing and provides exhibitors with insights into their audience, such as their demographics, interests and purchase behaviour, enabling cinemas and movie studios to engage their audiences, target their marketing, and grow their brands.
